import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./CoursesOffered.css';// Custom CSS for the course cards
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const coursesData=[{title:"Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com)",description:"This course covers financial and accounting skills, helping students gain expertise in commerce and related fields.",path:"/bcom"},{title:"Bachelor of Management Studies (BMS)",description:"BMS is designed to equip students with the latest management skills to navigate the complexities of business operations.",path:"/bms"},{title:"Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (B.Sc IT)",description:"This course emphasizes technical skills, teaching programming, database management, and other IT skills.",path:"/bsc-it"}];const CoursesOffered=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"courses-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"courses-section-title",children:"Courses Offered"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"courses-grid",children:coursesData.map((course,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:course.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:course.path,className:"course-link",children:"Learn More"})]},index))})]})});};export default CoursesOffered;
